graphql.query:
{
    merchant{
        id
        created
        created_by
        modified
        modified_by
        active
        is_deleted
        deleted
        deleted_by
        merchant_name
        merchant_email
        merchant_phone_number
        merchant_province
        merchant_city
        merchant_address
        merchant_postal_code
        merchant_category_id
        merchant_website
        merchant_media_social_id
        merchant_description
        merchant_image_profile
        merchant_gallery
    }
}

{
    outlet{
        id
        created
        created_by
        modified
        modified_by
        active
        is_deleted
        deleted
        deleted_by
        outlet_name

        outlet_postal_code
        outlet_longitude
        outlet_latitude
        outlet_day
        outlet_hour
        merchant_id
        timezone
    }
}

{

        id
        created

        active

    }
}

{

{
